TopicTitle: Transportation of Tanks or Home habitat

Articles.Content:
Hi

in order to build amun base I would like to be able to transport on truck some pieces like reservoir or Home modules.

I got CleverBobCat truck, I build a crane with K.A.S add on and I have many questions:

I try to use wheels with buit in motor like RoveMax Model from Kerbal motion LLC but all these models of wheels have no brakes, so I can never be sure my crane is not moving on the jun....

When I put a reservoir or a Home module in the truck, it is not fasten so it moves and fall at the slightest turn.

So what truck do you use for transport and what wheels on a moving crane build with Girder modular segment

Here is my crane which is a Bridge crane, with 2 tanks and engines to land on mun and parachutes for landing on planet with atmosphere.

Tanks are detachable once the Bridge crane is landed. It moves easily the only problem is that I never found wheels with brakes.

Uploaded with ImageShack.com

It would be great it some of you have some ideas for me.....

Thanks

All rover wheels have brakes.

For your unstable loads, try using quantum struts.
Press the break button at the top of the screen (the red one) to toggle the breaks.

Yes, the brakes button works, but in fact you can't store your vehicle on a slope because when you release the button, 1sec later the brakes are released and the vehicle moves in the slope...

Well I put landing gear struts on my bridge crane, that's the only way to leave it blocked on any terrain..There is no big slopes on the Mun but a small one is enough to make any heavy vehicle move...

Yes, the brakes button works, but in fact you can't store your vehicle on a slope because when you release the button, 1sec later the brakes are released and the vehicle moves in the slope...

No, only the keyboard shortcut should have that behaviour, the on-screen button is a toggle.
